title: Big Week for Trade Negotiations, November Jobs Data, End of the WTO
itunes:title: Big Week for Trade Negotiations, November Jobs Data, End of the WTO
description:
Bloomberg News Senior Trade Reporter Shawn Donnan talks about why it's a big week for trade negotiations between the U.S. and China. Becky Frankiewicz, President at ManpowerGroup, shares insight from November jobs data. Andy Browne, Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director, shares his insight on Hong Kong and the possible end of the WTO. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Businessweek National Correspondent Josh Green explain why things are getting brighter for President Trump. And we Drive to the Close with Kirk Hartman, President and Global Chief Investment Officer at Wells Fargo Asset Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
